channel.title: [317] Scronix: Developers Needed
channel.description:
Hey. Past month(s) I've been working on an oldschool PK server which I called Scronix. Currently I am the only developer, and since I simply cannot do it on my own I'll hire a server- and client developer. I've already got a website (with domain ofcourse) set up, it just needs some attention. If you're interested, fill in the format below. I'll provide more information about the server on Skype.
[code] Age: Position applying for: Past work: Experience: Dedication to a project (on a scale of 1 to 10): Skype: [/code]
[code] Server Developer: N/A [1 Position left] Client Developer: N/A [1 Position left] [/code]
Thanks!

item.title: [317] Scronix: Developers Needed
item.dc:creator: @Scronix Scronix
item.description:
@Scronix wrote:

@ Arcik, yes, that was my server.

@ Nessie, yeah I am. Oh well, thanks haha :rolleyes:.

@ Everybody else; Sorry for the late reply, added all of your Skypes and we’ll see!

Read full topic
